name: The Initiate 2: The First Interviews
description: Three people awake in adjacent prison cells with no recollection of how they got there. Now, they must work together in order to escape this nightmarish captivity. But can they really trust one another?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 64-bits Processor: Intel i7 4790k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 64-bits Processor: Intel i7 7700k Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
